website_summaries.verdict: The ViewSonic VX2880ml Ultra-High-Definition (UHD) monitor delivers a sharp picture with bold colors and inky blacks, but it suffers from narrow viewing angles and weak gray-scale performance and can't display UHD at 60Hz.

customer_reviews.title: Massively defective product
customer_reviews.text: I am on my 3rd monitor. First one would not hold a sync and flickered at will. The second one failed completely after 2 weeks of receiving as a replacement. The third one that arrived today has massive color adjustment issues that do not seem to be resolvable. Viewsonic has been VERY poor in their response to my needs in replacement of defective product. I have always bought Viewsonic monitors, considering them to be flagship product. I will never again purchase a product from this company. And if I don't resolve the current issues in the next 2-3 days, I will toss the monitor in the garbage and purchase a new one from another vendor
customer_reviews.author: KWALDENWOOD

customer_reviews.title: Don't even consider buying this item! JUNK
customer_reviews.text: This product came with a 90-day warranty....a joke for electronics in this day and age. But at least I now know why. I have had it for almost 11 months. About three weeks ago, it started blanking out on me for a few seconds at a time. Now it has stopped working altogether. It's now a paperweight. What a POS!

I'm stuck with this monitor for as long as it lasts (which from the sound of it won't be very long) because it's here now and I don't want to go through the hassle of returning it and finding another monitor in my price range, but I truly regret the decision to buy this monitor and wish I had listened to the other reviewers. I have used ViewSonic monitors for work and home for the past 4 years with no problems so I hoped that I'd get lucky here. Nope nope nope. this is not a quality product. move along.

customer_reviews.title: Grey and Blurry.

I returned the monitor and decided to stick to something sub-4K for now.

I unplugged the power and all the other cables, let it sit for a while and then tried it again. It is dead. I've always liked ViewSonic, but this incident will make me rethink another ViewSonic purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Rather Meh - Died quickly
customer_reviews.text: Ok monitor, as long as it worked. Mine died within 1 month of infrequent use - On powering-on, the backlight would turn on, but nothing will display. (When it used to work, it would start with a viewsonic logo, and then say source isn't connected or something of that sort). Promptly returned. The monitor itself is clear, not much to complain about the color reproduction. 30Hz only at 4K. The support for phone HDMI (cable supplied) seem liked a good feature, didn't actually try it though.

product_meta.title: ViewSonic VX2880ml 28-Inch 4K Ultra HD LED Monitor (3840x2160, 50M:1 DCR, HDMI (MHL), Dual DisplayPort Inputs and DisplayPort Outputs)
product_meta.description:
The ViewSonic VX2880ml is a 28” (28” viewable) 3840 x 2160 Ultra HD display that provides the highest resolution available in a desktop monitor. Delivering four-times the pixels of Full HD displays, the VX2880ml features 4K2K resolution, 1.07 billion colors, and a 50M:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio for the ultimate in image color, clarity, and detail. Versatile connectivity options include HDMI (MHL) for connection to smartphones and tablets, as well as dual Display Port inputs and one Display Port output for daisy-chain functionality. Dual integrated speakers provide enhanced audio for great multimedia and entertainment performance, while a VESA-mountable design offers additional convenience for use as a wall-mounted display. View Sonic's proprietary Flicker-Free Technology and Blue Light Filter helps to eliminate eye strain from extended viewing periods. The ViewSonic VX2880ml is the perfect 4K2K multimedia display for power and professional users, including CAD/CAM drawing, content design, and development applications.

The ViewSonic VX2880ml is a 28" 3840x2160 Ultra HD display that provides the highest resolution available in a desktop monitor. Delivering four-times the pixels of Full HD displays, the VX2880ml features 4K2K resolution, 1.07 billion colors, and a 50M:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio for the ultimate in image color, clarity, and detail. Versatile connectivity options include HDMI (MHL) for connection to smartphones and tablets, as well as dual DisplayPort inputs and one DisplayPort output for daisy-chain functionality. Dual integrated speakers provide enhanced audio for great multimedia and entertainment performance, while a VESA-mountable design offers additional convenience for use as a wall-mounted display. ViewSonic's proprietary Flicker-Free Technology and Blue Light Filter helps to eliminate eye strain from extended viewing periods. The ViewSonic VX2880ml is the perfect 4K2K multimedia display for power and professional users, including CAD/CAM drawing, content design, and development applications.

KEY FEATURES:
 * Ultra HD 3840x2160 (4K2K @ 30Hz) native resolution perfect for graphics-intensive applications, CAD/CAM, and content development
 * 10-bit color capability displays up to 1.07 billion colors for stunning images
 * 50M:1 MEGA Dynamic Contrast Ratio for the ultimate in clarity and detail
 * Integrated with HDMI and MHL inputs for versatile connectivity to a variety of entertainment devices
 * Dual DisplayPort inputs and DisplayPort outputs for daisy-chaining multiple screens and maximizing productivity
 * Proprietary View Mode feature includes Game, Movie, Web, Text, and Mono presets that enhance viewing experience for different scenarios
 * Flicker-Free and Blue Light Filter technology for more comfortable viewing
 * 3-year limited warranty and one of the industry's best pixel performance policy for your peace of mind






STUNNING 4K ULTRA HD RESOLUTION ON THE DESKTOP
This 4K2K Ultra HD display provides the highest resolution available in a desktop monitor. Featuring a 3840x2160 pixel screen that contains more than 8 million pixels, this ViewSonic display has four-times more pixels than Full HD resolution displays. It is the perfect 4K2K multimedia display for power and professional users, including CAD/CAM drawing, content design, and development applications.




10-BIT COLOR PROCESSING FOR AN AMAZING 1.07 BILLION COLORS
With innovative 10-bit color processing, this display can generate up to 1.07 billion colors for smooth color-to-color transitions, as well as enhanced grayscale performance. By displaying up to 1.07 billion colors, the VX2880ml delivers professional-grade color accuracy and stunning images ideal for any multimedia application.




HIGH-DEFINITION DAISY CHAIN CAPABILITY
Equipped with two DisplayPort inputs and one DisplayPort output, the VX2880ml supports daisy-chaining of multiple displays for multi-screen setup, consistent colors across screens, and easy cable management. Quad HD is supported on two daisy-chained displays (two screens total), while Full HD is supported on four daisy-chained displays (four screens total).




MHL FUNCTIONALITY FOR EASY CONNECTIVITY TO MOBILE DEVICES
Integrated with Mobile High-Definition Link (MHL), the VX2880ml enables users to connect compatible mobile devices, such as smartphones and tablets, directly to the VX2880ml display**. This allows digital content from mobile devices to be viewed in stunning Full HD resolution on the larger screen of the VX2880ml, while also simultaneously charging the batteries of the mobile device.




VIEWSONIC FLICKER-FREE TECHNOLOGY
ViewSonic flicker-free displays deliver on the promise of more comfortable viewing. Rather than using Pulse Width Modulation that continuously turns the LED backlight on and off, ViewSonic flicker-free displays use DC modulation backlights that maintain a steady stream of direct current powerâ€”nearly eliminating screen flickering at all brightness levels by providing a constant LED light source. 

This lets you work at your computer, play games, or watch movies longer â€“ without eye fatigue.




VIEWMODE SETTINGS FOR ENHANCED ON-SCREEN CONTENT
Enjoy excellent performance and accurate color rendering for everything you view on this display. With 5 different scenario presets, ViewSonic displays offer best-in-class calibration techniques to bring you the best digital viewing experience. This includes Game, Movie, Web, Text, and Mono presets to enhance black levels in games and movies, color luster for online images, and color temperature for reading text.




BLUE LIGHT FILTER FOR MORE COMFORTABLE VIEWING
Prolonged exposure to certain levels of blue light can cause eye discomfort. ViewSonic displays feature a Blue Light Filter setting that allows users to adjust the amount of blue light emitted from the screen, enabling longer viewing times and increased eye comfort for work and multimedia applications.




PLANET-FRIENDLY MERCURY-FREE LED BACKLIGHTING
LED backlighting enhances display performance, delivers an outstanding color range, and adjusts contrast ratios for remarkably detailed images. ViewSonic's mercury-free LED backlighting conserves more energy when compared to conventional displays. In addition, LED backlighting provides for a slim, lightweight profile that saves desktop space.




ECO-MODE CONSERVES MORE ENERGY
ViewSonic's proprietary Eco-mode feature is built into all LED displays, offering options to select "Optimize (80%)" or "Conserve (65%)" settings that save up to 35%* power. Especially in low ambient light, Eco-mode adjusts brightness and improves visibility, while reducing eye fatigue and prolonging the display's lamp life. With Eco-mode, both lamp replacement and energy expenditures are reduced.




VESA-MOUNTABLE
The ViewSonic VX2880ml features a 100 x 100mm VESA-mountable design that allows you to mount the display on a monitor stand or on a wall, depending on your specific needs. You can easily unscrew the base, and then mount the display on its new stand or wall mount.

INDUSTRY-LEADING PIXEL PERFORMANCE POLICY AND 3-YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY
One of the aspects that make ViewSonic a display technology leader is its dedication to quality. ViewSonic is committed to using the highest grade panels and offers the industry's leading pixel performance policy. We also back our displays with a 3-year limited warranty for your peace of mind.
